description: An array of the parties answering to a matter before the court

personDetails.description: Provided when the party is a person

organisation.description: Provided when the party is an organisation

organisationPersons.description: Array of persons in the organisation where the party is an organisation

representedOrganisation.description: The organisation details of the appointed representation

isSubject.description: Flag to indicate if the party is the subject of the application

isDefendantMatched.description: Flag to indicate if the respondent matched with a defendant on the case.

isMultipleDefendantMatched.description: Flag to indicate if the respondent matched with multiple defendant on the case.

defendantId.description: id of the defendant in common platform. Will be there if defendant matching happens.

caseId.description: id of the case in common platform where the respondant is matched with an existing defendant on the case. Will be there if defendant matching happens.
